title: Emerald Robe
summaries: The Emerald Robe is an Armor item and part of the Wizard set, being wearable in the shirt slot. It is the third strongest Gem Robe.

Wearing the Wizard Hat alongside the Emerald Robe provides a set bonus of +10% magic critical strike chance while wearing a Magic Hat alongside it provides a set bonus of +60 Mana. Any leg-slot equipment can be worn with these set bonuses intact.

statistics.Tooltip:

Reduces mana usage by 11%
